mapper.select: select n.noticeId,n.title,n.theme,n.mains,n.publishTime,n.empCode, n.states,e.empName from notice n,emp e where e.empCode=n.empCode and noticeId=#{noticeId}
select n.noticeId,n.title,n.theme,n.mains,n.publishTime,n.empCode, n.states,e.empName from notice n join emp e on n.empCode=e.empCode ORDER BY publishTime desc
